headline: What Analysts Think Is Changing the Story for Arch Capital Group Now
summary: Arch Capital Group’s fair value estimate has been nudged higher to about $107.56 per share as analysts balance the company’s strong underwriting discipline and investment income against a softer growth backdrop. This slight upward adjustment comes even as the assumed discount rate rises to around 6.96% and revenue growth expectations turn more cautious at roughly -1.52%, reflecting a market that sees Arch as a relative winner in a tougher property and casualty cycle. Stay tuned to see how...
